extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Device and Firmware Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the device is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device affected by the vulnerability?
Which device model is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Device Firmware to FW05
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device firmware to version FW05 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Device Firmware to FW14
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device firmware to version FW14 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Restrict network access to the device to prevent unauthorized access.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that strong passwords are used to secure the device.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Direct Internet Connection
extracted_playbook.description: Do not directly connect the device to the internet to reduce exposure to threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused TCP/UDP Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Disable any unused TCP/UDP ports to minimize potential attack vectors.
